description:
KingOfTheEtherThrone (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#26-182) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- pastMonarchs.push(currentMonarch) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#138)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 1000000000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 1000000000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#160)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 100000000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 100000000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#158)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 10000000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 10000000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#156)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 10000000000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 10000000000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#162)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 100000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 100000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#152)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- currentClaimPrice = 1000000000000000 * (rawNewClaimPrice / 1000000000000000) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#154)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(valuePaid) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#110)

KingOfTheEtherThrone.claimThrone(string) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#103-169) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(excessPaid) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/king_of_the_ether_throne.sol#118)
